mapper.select: SELECT total_title, ann_type, reception_type, started_at, closed_at, sub_title, task_type, planning_year, tech_field_name, perf_owner FROM announcement a INNER JOIN sub_announcement sa ON a.ann_no = sa.ann_no WHERE sa.sub_ann_no = #{subAnnNO}

SELECT rp.sub_ann_no, rp.task_name, rp.rnd_task_no, m.name AS researcher_name, i.name AS institution_name FROM rnd_plan rp LEFT JOIN researcher r ON r.rnd_plan_no = rp.rnd_plan_no AND r.manpower_role = '연구책임자' LEFT JOIN member m ON m.mem_no = r.mem_no LEFT JOIN institution i ON i.institution_no = m.institution_no WHERE rp.sub_ann_no = #{subAnnNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rnd_plan(rnd_plan_no, rnd_task_no, sub_ann_no, mem_no, task_name, plan_status, curr_step, created_at) VALUES (#{rndPlanNo}, #{rndTaskNo}, #{subAnnNo}, #{memNo}, #{taskName}, #{planStatus}, #{currStep}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

INSERT INTO rnd_field ( rnd_field_no, rnd_plan_no, name, weight, rank ) VALUES
( seq_rnd_field.NEXTVAL, #{rndField.rndPlanNo}, #{rndField.name}, #{rndField.weight}, #{rndField.rank} )

INSERT INTO rnd_period ( stage_no, year_no, started_at, ended_at, mxnth, rnd_plan_no ) VALUES
( #{rndPeriod.stageNo}, #{rndPeriod.yearNo}, #{rndPeriod.startedAt}, #{rndPeriod.endedAt}, #{rndPeriod.mxnth}, #{rndPeriod.rndPlanNo} )

INSERT INTO stage_content ( stage_no, stg_tgt_content, rnd_content, rnd_plan_no ) VALUES
( #{stageContent.stageNo}, #{stageContent.stgTgtContent}, #{stageContent.rndContent}, #{stageContent.rndPlanNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT final_tgt_content, rnd_content, perf_content FROM rnd_plan WHERE rnd_plan_no = #{rndPlanNo}
SELECT rnd_plan_no, stage_no, year_no, started_at, ended_at, mxnth FROM rnd_period WHERE rnd_plan_no = #{rndPlanNo}
SELECT rnd_plan_no, stage_no, stg_tgt_content, rnd_content FROM stage_content WHERE rnd_plan_no = #{rndPlanNo}
